@@ -979,15 +979,90 @@ def test_factory_size_check(self):
         indices = self.IndexTensor([[1, 2], [0, 2]])

body: I changed it for all call sites that has arguments. For this one, we don't have the no-arg constructor `torch.sparse_coo_tensor()` yet, but we can probably add one (we don't have `torch.tensor()` though at the moment).
